Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: Ouch... My head hurts sooo bad. What happened with me? What is this place?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: I have to find the way home before it goes dark. God knows how many beasts live here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: Wh-! A talking cat! What is this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Kira
Dialogues.Text: Call me Kira. Do you need something stranger, you look lost?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: I am. I need to find the way out before dawn.

Dialogues.Speaker: Kira
Dialogues.Text: Hmm, I can't help you with that. Although I saw a strange looking cottage down the road.

Dialogues.Speaker: Kira
Dialogues.Text: There are rumours of a very important lantern in it. Maybe it can help you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Kira
Dialogues.Text: But beware! There is a mysterious evil creature that lurks around the forest. We call it The Beast. If you see it, run!
